description: Connect your Mac to a Digital Video Camera. The cable supports simultaneous connection of up to 63 devices, peer-to-peer device connections, and plug-and-play device installation. It also allows hot swapping and real-time digital audio and video transfer speeds of up to 400Mbps from your Mac to any FireWire 800 device. The 1394b specification is backward-compatible with existing FireWire technology, and makes this cable an ideal solution for older devices.
title: Belkin MacBook Pro FireWire 9-4 Pin Cable(F3N416eb06-APL)
